global.error-occurred: An error has occurred. Please, try again later.

login.popover-get-code: If the credentials are correct, you will receive an email with your login code. For security reasons, no notification is made if the credentials are not correct.
login.popover-login-failed: The credentials are not correct. Please, try again.
login.register-success-modal-body: You will receive an email with the instructions to complete the registration process.
login.register-mail-just-sent: A registration email was sent to that email address a few minutes ago. Please, follow the instructions in the email to complete the registration process.
login.register-temporarily-locked: For security reasons, you can only make a registration request every 5 minutes. Please, wait before trying again.

registration.info-password: Please, choose a strong password. It must have at least {passwordMinlength} characters. Try to use a sentence you can remember. Your password will be used to encrypt your secrets.
registration.info-security-questions: Please, choose {numberOfSecurityQuestions} questions and answers only you know. If you forget your password, the answers to these questions will be the only way to recover your secrets. The answers must have at least {securityAnswerMinLength} characters.
registration.registration-completed: Your account has been successfully registered.
registration.registration-token-not-found: Sorry, the registration code is not valid. Please, start over the registration process again.
registration.registration-token-expired: Sorry, the registration code has expired. Please, start over the registration process again.
registration.password-insufficient-length: Your password must have at least {passwordMinLength} characters.
registration.password-repeated-in-security-question: Please, do not repeat the password in a question.
registration.password-repeated-in-security-answer: Please, do not repeat the password in an answer.
registration.security-question-not-trimmed: Be careful! Do not include spaces at the beginning or end of a question.
registration.security-question-repeated-in-password: Please, do not repeat a question in the password.
registration.security-question-repeated: Please, do not repeat a question.
registration.security-question-repeated-in-answer: Please, do not repeat a question in an answer.
registration.security-answer-not-trimmed: Be careful! Do not include spaces at the beginning or end of an answer.
registration.security-answer-insufficient-length: Your answers must have at least {securityAnswerMinLength} characters.
registration.security-answer-repeated-in-password: Please, do not repeat an answer in the password.
registration.security-answer-repeated: Please, do not repeat an answer.
registration.security-answer-repeated-in-question: Please, do not repeat an answer in a question.

my-secrets.title: My Secrets
my-secrets.no-secrets: Nothing in my pockets, nothing up my sleeves. Add a secret!
my-secrets.delete-secret-modal-body: The secret will be deleted! Are you sure?

shared-secrets.do-not-self-share: You cannot share one of your secrets with yourself.
shared-secrets.secret-already-shared-with-email: The secret is already shared with that email.
shared-secrets.secret-not-shared-with-email: The secret is not shared with that email.
shared-secrets.secret-not-shared-with-you: That secret is not shared with you.

secrets-shared-with-me.title: Secrets Shared With Me
secrets-shared-with-me.no-secrets: Nobody shared anything with you. What a pitty!
secrets-shared-with-me.reject-shared-secret-modal-body: Are you sure you want to reject this secret shared with you?
